chat.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you today?
chat.error: Sorry, there was an error processing your request.

onboarding.welcome: Hi! I'm your legal assistant. Before we begin, please select your preferred language.
onboarding.fullName: Great! I'll be helping you set up your profile. What's your full name?
onboarding.address: What is your current residential address? (Street, City, State, ZIP)
onboarding.householdSize: How many people are in your household?
onboarding.sfResident: Are you a current resident of San Francisco?
onboarding.income: What is your total annual household income?
onboarding.employmentStatus: What is your current employment status?
onboarding.ssn: Do you have a Social Security Number?
onboarding.completion: Thanks! Your profile is all set. I'll take you to your dashboard now.
onboarding.invalidInput: Sorry, that doesn't seem to be valid. Please try again.
